title: Driftworks Font, totally stuck.
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm totally stuck with this font, it looks so familiar but I just can't place it.

I'm guessing the angled edges of the font is an edit done afterwards, but I just need to the original font to start from!

Thanks to anyone who knows it!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Driftworks](http://web.archive.org/web/20130113035133/http:/typophile.com/files/drift.jpg) | 47.24 KB |
author: dolbarian

comments.content:
It looks like the Dafont freebie [Battlestar](http://web.archive.org/web/20130113035133/http:/www.dafont.com/battlestar.font?nb_ppp=50&text=DRIFTWORKS) without the inline.

- Mike Yanega
